I had high expectations for this one cause of the cover and what was said on here.  But this is exactly why people should leave detailed reviews cause I got to say, I would not recommend this if you are a collector.  If you are new to the hentai world, then you might like it.  I was hoping for a guy to just be obsessed with his brother's wife to the point he kidnaps her and rapes her and beats her and ties her up.  Nope, not even close.  Bad acting was the cheery on top.

I was looking for this movie since I saw it on TV years ago. It was difficult to found it. When I saw it in Amazon, I was so excited! I love John Ritter in this movie. His characterization as Barney is great, as an adolescent full of resentments for his father and against all social convencionalisms, and then as a young adult, and as an adult in the middle age. The movie starts in the mids 80's and go backwards to the lates 50's, when at a Christmas party Barney met Eleanor by chance, and they fall in love at first sight. It is amazing how the characters change through time in this movie, and how the actors succeed in representing this age changes! For life circumstances and because of Eleanor's mother pressure, she get married to Bill, Barney's brother, though deep in her heart she always loves Barney. Barney never gets marry, always waiting for his eternal love. What happened at the end? I won't tell you. If you haven't seen the movie, go buy it! This is a movie that most women will love, it has romance, comedy and drama. You will enjoy it and love it as much as I do!

This story was right up there! It had a story line with enough action to keep you glued to the main theme. As for the characters, they each had their own lives to carry on. The four stars are just for starters. An excellent presentation that kept you interested in to what would happen next. They could even make a series on this anime.

This will be a short review, at first I was hesitant after reading what this video was about. I took a chance, and found that I identified with the actions of the young man in his quest at revenge against his brother. When you look at the totality of the show you find that though immature, he truly loved his brothers wife who was taken from him. Seeing how the brother had treated other females as objects, and talked down to his brother I personally could find no fault in what happened. It was fun, however the actually acts and depictions of parts of anatomy left somewhat to be desired, the end was payback in spades.

Takashi is a collage student who lives with his older brother Satoshi and his wife Miwa. Takashi has had a thing for Miwa for years and Satoshi knows it. then one night Takashi has a chance encounter with one of his professors and she at one time dated Satoshi. now the professor has decided to turn Takashi into the man that no woman could resist. with this new confidence Takashi decides to take Miwa back from his brother as well as keep the relationship going with the professor and start a love relationship with Miwa's younger sister.
This is an absolutely charming movie. Will definitely watch this one multiple times. Loved it! <3 Heartwarming :)
